name: Wheel of Time Quiz 3 | Mixed Wheel of Time | 10 Questions

questions.text: In the 1st book, what is the name of the Trolloc who talks to Rand in Rand's house?
What physical feature are Myrdraals lacking?
questions.explanation:
Eyes & Eye & Eyeballs & Eyeball.

	They can, however, see very well.

questions.text: Speaking of Myrdraal, who is the super tall Myrdraal who is the Dark One's 'messenger'?
questions.explanation:
Shaidar Haran.

	Shadar Logoth is a ruined city, Narg is a Trolloc, and Shai'tan is the true name of the Dark One.

Saidin.

	Saidin is the male half of the True Source, the power which drives the wheel of time. Saidin allows males to channel the Source. However, Saidin was tainted when the Hundred Companions sealed the Dark one in Shayol Ghul and the Dark one launched his counterstroke. But look at me, I'm rambling.

questions.text: Can females channel Saidin or Saidar?

questions.explanation:
Robert Jordan.

	Robert Jordan is, actually, a pseudonym.

questions.text: Where did Rand first sleep with Aviendha?
questions.explanation:
In an igloo.

	It was just to keep warm, though... {;)}

questions.text: What is Mat's full first name?
What is the elite military force of Seanchan?
questions.explanation:
Deathwatch Guards.

	Defenders of the Stone are from Tear. White Lions are from Andor. Borderlanders are, well, people from the Borderlands. (The countries that border the Great Blight.)

questions.text: Rand is all of these except which?
questions.explanation:
Nae'blis.

	The Nae'blis is the highest Forsaken. A Ta'veren is someone who bends the pattern, the Coramoor is the savior of the Sea Folk, and the Car'a'carn is the savior of the Aiel.
